author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Union government has launched a mobile app for lodging complaints pertaining to grievances associated with Central government offices.

An official statement from Employees’ Provident Fund Regional Office here said that the Department of Administrative Reforms and Public Grievances had launched a mobile app for lodging public grievance on Government of India Public Grievance portal — Centralised Public Grievances Redress and Monitoring System (CPGRAMS), which can be installed on Android-based mobiles. The main objective of launching the mobile app was to facilitate easy lodging of a grievance by an aggrieved citizen.

Steps to install the mobile app: Log on to http://pgportal.gov.in; capture the QR Code using QR Code Reader; download the app through the captured link; install the app on your Android mobile; and open the app after installation and lodge the complaint, the statement said.
title: Mobile app for lodging complaints
